MemoryInfobox.name: Thank You, 'Maláka'!
MemoryInfobox.description: 'Kassandra received a letter addressed to her by Aiantides|Aiantides the Proud, who demanded she take his treasure...'
MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey' – 'Legacy of the First Blade: Hunted'

General_Description: '''Thank You, ''Maláka''!''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra found a letter from a [[Aiantides|villager]] who demanded she take his treasure.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra returned to [[Potidaia]], coming across a letter addressed to her near a cart. *'''Kassandra:''' ''Aiantides the Proud... Strange name.'' She read the letter. :'''Thank You, ''Maláka'''''
''[[Eagle]] Bearer, how dare you?! You saved me at the burning village and got away with it! I can't let that happen. I, Aiantides the Proud, will never be indebted to anyone! I've got to pay you back!

I've hidden treasure for you between the pair of evergreen trees south of Potidaia, away from prying [[Iran|Persian]] eyes. Good luck, we're even now. My conscience is clear! Farewell... and I look forward to not seeing you again.'' Kassandra headed south Potidaia, Nearing the Location. '''Kassandra:''' ''What's this?'' There, she recovered a pouch left behind between the trees, inside containing [[drachmae]], goods, and a [[Carefully Crafted Helmet|helmet]].
Section_Outcome: Kassandra collected the reward left behind by Aiantides, a villager she saved in Potidaia.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]'' – ''[[Legacy of the First Blade: Hunted]]''

Structured_Dialogue.content: Kassandra returned to [[Potidaia]], coming across a letter addressed to her near a cart.

:'''Thank You, ''Maláka'''''
''[[Eagle]] Bearer, how dare you?! You saved me at the burning village and got away with it! I can't let that happen. I, Aiantides the Proud, will never be indebted to anyone! I've got to pay you back!

I've hidden treasure for you between the pair of evergreen trees south of Potidaia, away from prying [[Iran|Persian]] eyes. Good luck, we're even now. My conscience is clear! Farewell... and I look forward to not seeing you again.''
Kassandra headed south Potidaia, Nearing the Location.
There, she recovered a pouch left behind between the trees, inside containing [[drachmae]], goods, and a [[Carefully Crafted Helmet|helmet]].
